meanings.definition: A short film or video that is a special feature on a DVD or Blu-ray.
meanings.sent1: I watched a featurette about the making of the movie on the DVD.
meanings.sent2: The featurette on the Blu-ray included interviews with the actors.
meanings.sent3: The featurette on the DVD was so interesting, I watched it twice!
meanings.sent4: The featurette provided a behind-the-scenes look at the film production.
meanings.sent5: The featurette revealed secrets about the movie that I never knew.

meanings.definition: A small feature or distinctive attribute of something.
meanings.sent1: The unique featurette of the car was its solar-powered roof.
meanings.sent2: The featurette of the phone was its fingerprint scanner.
meanings.sent3: She noticed a featurette on the painting that no one else had seen before.
meanings.sent4: The featurette of the house was the hidden garden in the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The small featurette of the watch was the glowing numbers in the dark.
